title: Remove bank logo from debit card and restore original content

requirements.summary: Remove the bank logo image from the top-right corner of the DebitCard component and restore the original content that was displayed in that area before the logo was added
acceptanceCriteria: The bank logo image is no longer rendered in the top-right corner of the debit card
The original content (text or element) that existed before the logo was added is restored in its place
The debit card layout remains visually consistent and well-styled

file_operations.description: Remove the bank logo image element from the top-right corner of the debit card component and restore the original content (likely text-based branding such as the bank name) that was displayed before the logo was introduced. Ensure the layout remains visually consistent with proper spacing and styling.
